dmca.title: My Website Is Copied by www.fanyicn.net
dmca.body:
This guy copied amlost entire website of mine. I desined and set up my website www.begray.com 10 years ago. Yes, later I gave it up and invovled in other business which was have nothing to do with compouter and the internet. But the website was desined by me and all contents should owned by me. When I came again to the internet business and set up my site again, I found this guy copied my entire website contents even the design with his own domain www. fanyicn.net. This is unfair to me.  

Yang Lee
yangzhou2130@gmail.com
